main event: A cigar-shaped object approximately 15-20 feet long was sighted over Cleveland, Ohio on August 8, 1951.
interesting points: The object was reported to have a dark color resembling a buzz bomb., It was observed traveling at a high speed at approximately 6000 feet altitude., The sighting direction was 290 degrees west., The sighting lasted for a duration of approximately 9 minutes., The case was eventually evaluated as an aircraft.
witness description: Pilot observing the object from approximately 2 miles at 1500 feet.
